info.title: PurplShip Multi-carrier API
info.description: PurplShip is a Multi-carrier Shipping API that simplifies the integration of logistic carrier services

get.description: Returns the list of configured carriers

parameters.name: carrierId
parameters.description: Indicates a specific carrier configuration name.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: The test flag indicates whether to use a carrier configured for test.

post.description:
The Shipping process begins by fetching rates for your shipment.
The rate request return the backbone of your shipment object adding
the rates retrieved from one or many carriers based on your filter.

Once a Shipment is initialized by fetching the rates, the remaining requirements might be specified 
to submit the shipment to the carrier of the selected rate of your choice.

get.description: You can track a shipment by specifying the carrier and the shipment tracking number.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: The test flag indicates whether to use a carrier configured for test.

carrierId.title: Carrier id
carrierId.description: Indicates a specific carrier configuration name.

test.title: Test
test.description: The test flag indicates whether to use a carrier configured for test.

RateShipperAddress.title: Shipper
RateShipperAddress.description: The origin address of the shipment (address from)

companyName.title: Company name
companyName.description: The company name if the party is a not residential

phoneNumber.title: Phone number
phoneNumber.description:
The party phone number.

Note that the expected format is: **1 514 0000000**

Country Code | Area Code | Phone
--- | --- | ---
1 | 514 | 0000000

residential.title: Residential
residential.description: Indicates if The address is residential or commercial (enterprise)

addressLine1.title: Address line1
addressLine1.description: The address line with street number

addressLine2.title: Address line2
addressLine2.description: The address line with suite number

companyName.title: Company name
companyName.description: The company name if the party is a not residential

phoneNumber.title: Phone number
phoneNumber.description:
The party phone number.

Note that the expected format is: **1 514 0000000**

Country Code | Area Code | Phone
--- | --- | ---
1 | 514 | 0000000

residential.title: Residential
residential.description: Indicates if The address is residential or commercial (enterprise)

addressLine1.title: Address line1
addressLine1.description: The address line with street number

addressLine2.title: Address line2
addressLine2.description: The address line with suite number

packagingType.title: Packaging type
packagingType.description:
The parcel's packaging type.

Note that the packaging is optional when using a package preset

For specific carriers packaging type, please consult the reference.

packagePreset.title: Package preset
packagePreset.description:
The parcel's package preset.

For specific carriers package preset, please consult the reference.

isDocument.title: Is document
isDocument.description: Indicates if the parcel is composed of documents only

COD.title: Cod
COD.description: The cash that should be collected on delivery.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The amount to collect on delivery

Insurance.title: Insurance
Insurance.description: adding an insurance to the shipment

email.title: Email
email.description:
The alternative notification email.

Note that by default the recipient email will be used.

ShipmentOption.title: Options
ShipmentOption.description:
The options available for the shipment.

Note that this is a dictionary in which you can can add as many carrier shipment
options you desire to add to your shipment. 

Please consult the reference for additional specific carriers options.

option1.title: Option1
option1.description: Please consult the reference for additional specific carriers options.

option2.title: Option2
option2.description: Please consult the reference for additional specific carriers options.

services.description:
The requested carrier service for the shipment.

Please consult the reference for specific carriers services.

Note that this is a list because on a Multi-carrier rate request you could specify a service per carrier.

carrierIds.description: The list of configured carriers you wish to get rates from.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The rate monetary values currency code

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: The monetary amount of the discount on the rate

baseCharge.title: Base charge
baseCharge.description:
The rate's monetary amount of the base charge.

This is the net amount of the rate before additional charges

totalCharge.title: Total charge
totalCharge.description:
The rate's monetary amount of the total charge.

This is the gross amount of the rate after adding the additional charges

dutiesAndTaxes.title: Duties and taxes
dutiesAndTaxes.description: The monetary amount of the duties and taxes if applied

extraCharges.description: list of the rate's additional charges

services.description:
The requested carrier service for the shipment.

Please consult the reference for specific carriers services.

Note that this is a list because on a Multi-carrier rate request you could specify a service per carrier.

options.title: Options
options.description:
The options available for the shipment.

Please consult the reference for additional specific carriers options.

carrierIds.description: The list of configured carriers you wish to get rates from.

messages.description: The list of note, error or warning messages
